item.title: Drafting By Cross Section
item.description: Drafting By Cross-Section # Drafting by cross-section allows you to think through the relationships between successive weft pics differently than the draft. It can also be helpful for planning and generating drafts from different layered cross sections. Here are some worksheets that can help you: For a quick slideshow on how to draft by cross section using these worksheets visit: Drafting By Cross Section Tutorial Creating Cross-Sections for Single Layer structures # This can be useful for understanding how different pics will stack upon eachother or how color effects might emerge.
